item.title: Getting Cavalier About Ethernet
item.description: Is ignoring Ethernet an option for your business’s connection to the world? Can you afford to miss out on its benefits? We’re talking about Cavalier Telephone, a competitive telecom provider, whose Ethernet services are now available on the GeoQuote (tm) search tool within our Shop for Ethernet service. While their name might imply a casual approach, Cavalier is serious about providing the bandwidth your growing business requires. Cavalier Telephone is a regional Competitive Local Exchange Carrier (CLEC) serving 15 states in the Eastern and Southern US, including Washington D.

item.title: The Importance Of Buying Ernest
item.description: Businesses with numerous locations often struggle to manage their telecommunications across the board. Wouldn’t a single, national provider that understands local needs be ideal? While that might seem contradictory, Ernest Communications offers precisely that solution. Ernest specializes in serving businesses with widespread locations, such as chain stores, hotels, and restaurants, by providing phone lines, data connections, and wireless services. Essentially, any company with franchises, branches, or service centers across various regions fits their model.

item.title: Is MagicJack The Next Ma Bell?
item.description: The telephone industry is facing challenges as young people are increasingly abandoning traditional landlines, which were once considered essential by previous generations. The breakup of the Bell System into smaller regional companies suggests that the era of a single, all-encompassing telephone provider is over. However, the story doesn’t end there. While it’s true that cell phones have replaced landlines for a significant portion of the population, particularly among younger demographics who have grown up with wireless technology, the evolution of the industry goes beyond this shift.
